column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Asami says : " She ai n't pretty , but I think she 'll do the job . "
#Text=Korra says : " No time for a test run .
#Text=We did it !
#Text=" Asami says : " You want to buy a slightly used sand - sailer ?
#Text=" Captain says : " Thanks , Asami .
#Text=You got a good head on your shoulders .
#Text=" Korra says : " I 'm sorry for getting us stranded out there .
#Text=I did n't mean for that to happen .
#Text=" Captain says : " You know , whatever the conflict between you and the queen is , I 'm sure it 's above my pay grade .
#Text=You 've got a tough job .
#Text=Good luck , Avatar .
#Text=" Arik says : " Captain , have we been in the desert for too long ?
#Text=Or is that really a dragon over there ?
#Text=" Captain says : " Ugh , let 's go get a drink .
#Text=" Korra says : " Dhaaah !
#Text=Easy , girl .
#Text=Did you think we were n't coming back to you ?
#Text=" Korra says : " What are you all doing here ?
#Text=" Tonraq says : " Korra , you 're safe .
#Text=" Korra says : " Yeah , we made it out of the desert .
#Text=Thanks to Asami .
#Text=" Tonraq says : " Do you remember Lord Zuko ?
#Text=" Zuko says : " I met you when you were a very young girl .
#Text=It 's good to see you again , Avatar Korra .
#Text=" Korra says : " It 's good to see you , Lord Zuko .
#Text=" Lin says : " Thanks for ditching me back at Zaofu .
#Text=" Korra says : " Yeah , sorry about that .
#Text=But , how did you all find us ?
#Text=" Lin says : " I am a detective , you know .
#Text=" Asami says : " Did you find Mako and Bolin ?
#Text=" Lin says : " Some people at the inn saw them captured by Zaheer 's crew .
#Text=We do n't know where they are .
#Text=" Tonraq says : " Did you hear about the Earth Queen ?
#Text=" Korra says : " What about her ?
#Text=" Radio says : " Once again , the Earth Queen 's reign has come to an abrupt and violent end .
#Text=Ba Sing Se has descended into chaos .
#Text=Rioters and looters have overrun the palace .
#Text=" Korra says : " The Red Lotus .
#Text=" Tonraq says : " What 's that ?
#Text=" Korra says : " The name of the group that 's been trying to capture me and just took out the Earth Queen .
#Text=I 'm afraid this is only the beginning , Dad .
#Text="
